title: Login Issues - Can't Access Account
description: Customer is unable to log in to their account. They've tried resetting their password multiple times but still can't access it.

title: Payment Not Processing
description: User reports that credit card payments are failing despite valid credentials. Issue started after last update.

title: Unable to Upload Files
description: Customer is facing errors when uploading files larger than 10MB. Error code: UP504.

title: Reset Password Link Expired
description: Reset link sent via email expires within seconds. Customer has tried multiple times.

title: App Crashes on Launch
description: Mobile app crashes immediately after opening. Occurs on both iOS and Android versions 2.4.1.

title: Email Notifications Not Received
description: User stopped receiving email alerts after updating notification settings.

title: Incorrect Billing Amount
description: Customer was charged twice for a single order. Needs immediate refund assistance.

title: Slow Website Loading Time
description: Customer reports that website takes over 15 seconds to load dashboard page.

title: Two-Factor Authentication Error
description: User is unable to receive verification code on phone for two-factor authentication.

title: UI Not Loading Properly
description: Interface elements are misaligned on Safari browser version 15. Issue not seen on Chrome.

title: Refund Request Pending Too Long
description: Customer has been waiting over 3 weeks for a refund confirmation.

title: Cannot Change Account Email
description: User is unable to update their registered email address in account settings.

title: Missing Order Confirmation Email
description: Push notifications appear 10–15 minutes late on Android devices.

title: Broken Link in Dashboard
description: Reports link on user dashboard leads to a 404 page. Needs fixing before next update.

title: Subscription Auto-Renewal Failed
description: Customer’s yearly subscription did not auto-renew. Payment info is up to date.
